an5.85:1.1: “Mendicants, a senior mendicant with five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
an5.85:1.3: They can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.85:1.4: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is unlikable and unlovable to their spiritual companions, not respected or admired.
an5.85:2.1: A senior mendicant with five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.
an5.85:2.3: They can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.85:2.4: A senior mendicant with these five qualities is dear and beloved to their spiritual companions, respected and admired.”
